mapper.insert: insert into log (url, type, method, args, total_time, operate_user) values (#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{args,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalTime,jdbcType=REAL}, #{operateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update log set url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, args = #{args,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_time = #{totalTime,jdbcType=REAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, url, type, method, args, total_time from log
